channel.title: PI Following
channel.description:
Please watch this video:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tHxEs1hATZc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
How can I clean up my following because its really messy. Ive tryed adding PlayerClip.java and the Clippedspots.txt but it didnt do anything. Please could someone help me out. :confused: :palm:

item.title: PI Following
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You should search for a tutorial on it, I think there’s one on another rsps site. Alternatively if you know what you’re doing rip it out of another person’s source.

Read full topic
